[quote]                     Rippers Note:
For this rip, I have kept it simple & easy. I have properly
deinterlaced this, and denoised. Sharpening was kept at a
minimum, because the source is terrible. There is already
pixillation on DVD9 as well as HUGE blocking issues. Therefore
sharening is a waste of time. No colour adjustments were 
necessary for this rip. I have Chosen the Ac3 2-Channel Audio for 
Superior Quality over VBR MP# version...

You may ask why 624 x 272? why not a larger resolution. as you 
can see/ the bitrate for the video is hovering around the 1000
mark. In the Option of DRs and the Teammates, a movie full of 
dance numbers would have required a high amount of bitrate. when
working with a 1/3 DVD sized rip, we have to take into
consideration this factor, along with what aspect Ratio looks
good. So then why not 640 Width at least? Because there was no
solution for correct A/R on this. Regardless, it\&#039;s a very
good rip. Enjoy.[/quote]
